Comments_List: I went from knowing nothing about AML/CTF to being both informed and passionate about the subject.

Readings are always informative and interesting. The same can be said for the many notable guest speakers that are brought in. The final paper was a great opportunity for students to apply their existing knowledge and expertise to AML/CTF. Finally, being able to learn from Professor King and the other students made this class uniquely special.
I have already recommended this course to anyone who sounds remotely interested.
